page.title: 09LIFESTYLES IN PENWORTHAM
page.content: In Penwortham most girls and boys follow hair trends. Girls and boys alike dye and streak their hair. This is usually done at a hairdresser's boutique or salon. The hairdressers in Penwortham are as follows: Manor House Hairdressers Snippers Hair Design Ken's Place Studio 28 Harry and Richard Sue Ann Hairdressers Garnett-Wilford Images Sally Ann Uni-sex Hair Salon All of these hairdressers offer practically the same services as each other and the ones in the town centre. The prices are alike too. A cut and blow can cost about Â£1.50 and a perm can be as expensive as 28 pounds.
